title: "Ecobank, AMA Academy to train & honour journalists in Fintech"
excerpt: "Ecobank Group, the leading Pan-African banking Group committed to developing and supporting Fintechs to transform digital finance and banking, today announced a partnership with AMA Academy, which is the only free-to-use pan-African online learning platform dedicated to up-skilling journalists in Africa."
